# @pandacss/no-config-function-in-source

ğŸ’¼ This rule is enabled in the following configs: ğŸŒ `plugin:@pandacss/all`, âœ… `plugin:@pandacss/recommended`.

ğŸ”§ This rule is automatically fixable by the

<!-- end auto-generated rule header -->

Prohibit the use of config functions outside the Panda config.

```json
{
  "plugins": ["@pandacss"],
  "rules": {
    "@pandacss/no-config-function-in-source": "warn" // or error
  }
}
```
